attributes.action: Matt Hancock should be fired from his role as Health Secretary
attributes.additional_details: What is the point of the people adhering to social distancing rules and having imposed fines to the people for breaching such rules when the persons in charge and making the rules can so blatantly disregard these rules. It makes a complete mockery of the system. Matt Hancock should be punished for his actions and the only way to do this is to fire Matt Hancock from his current role.
attributes.background: Matt Hancock should be fired from his role as Secretary of State for Health of the United Kingdom after his blatant disregard of the Coronavirus social distancing rules

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.

Since you started your petition, Matt Hancock has resigned and Sajid Javid has been appointed Secretary of State for Health and Social Care.

You can read Matt Hancock's resignation letter and the Prime Minister's response here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/matt-hancocks-resignation-letter-and-the-prime-ministers-response

And you can read the press release announcing the appointment of Sajid Javid as Secretary of State for Health and Social Care here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/the-rt-hon-sajid-javid-mp-appointed-secretary-of-state-for-health-and-social-care
